main: Except S1, skills trigger {status:Discard} to generate {status:Vibration} Count. At 5+ Count, S1 gets Coin Power and S2 gets {status:VibrationExplosion}. At 10+ Count, S3 consumes 10 to get Coin Power and 2 {status:VibrationExplosion}s.

1010501.desc: Upon triggering [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, inflict 1 [DefenseDown] per 4 Stagger Threshold raised (Max 5 per 1 enemy every turn)
1010501.name: In Times Like These...

1010521.desc: When 1 ally with the lowest Max HP triggers [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, inflict 1 [DefenseDown] next turn per 4 Stagger Threshold raised (Max 3 per 1 enemy every turn)
1010521.name: Cleaning Up the Mess
